scripts.build: octopus src/index.8o bin/octojam8.8o && octopus src/index.8o bin/octojam8-octo.8o OCTO && cat bin/octojam8-octo.8o | pbcopy
scripts.build-all: npm run build && npm run build-binary && npm run build-html
scripts.build-binary: npm run build && octo bin/octojam8.8o bin/octojam8.ch8 && octo bin/octojam8-octo.8o bin/octojam8-octo.ch8
scripts.build-html: npm run build && octo --options octo-config.json bin/octojam8-octo.8o docs/index.html
